comment: Discord wants to sell your data, and if that data is breached or leaked they don't want to be held responsible. Here's how to opt out
amr:
# ::snt Discord wants to sell your data, and if that data is breached or leaked they don't want to be held responsible. Here's how to opt out
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (w / want-01
                  :ARG0 (c / company
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Discord"))
                  :ARG1 (s / sell-01
                        :ARG0 c
                        :ARG1 (d / data
                              :poss (y / you))))
            :op2 (w2 / want-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (h / hold-02
                        :ARG0 c
                        :ARG1 (r / responsible-01
                              :ARG0 c
                              :ARG1 d))
                  :condition (o / or
                        :op1 (b / breach-01
                              :ARG0 c
                              :ARG1 d)
                        :op2 (l / leak-01
                              :ARG0 c
                              :ARG1 d))))
      :snt2 (t / thing
            :manner-of (o2 / opt-01
                  :ARG1 (o3 / out-06))
            :location (h2 / here)))
